divs: sighting detailsat in backyard looking to the sky when i saw the redish orb coasting along way up in the sky coming toward my direction, i ran in grabbed camcorder and attempted to film it but the camera wouldnt focus, ufo seemed just coast or glide along in the sky with intermittent side to side movements and it seemedto know i was there b\c it turned on light and increased speed in said direction (ne)as i tried to film it unsuccessfully
Summary: small redish orange orb moving toward me in sky thought it was a satellite at first wondering about color...as it was approximately above my head seemed to turn on bluish white light and then increased speed heading northeast
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in North Little Rock
There were no other sightings in North Little Rock on or around December 12th 2012
